post.body: we'd like to know your demands and terms... We'll do anything! (ALMOST)
Heck no! Used a thing called a credit card! http://www.ediblearrangements.com/
me am so jealous!
that's funny, I'll be traveling UNTIL 2009!
Pink Floyd-DSOTM, Beatles-Abbey Road, AC/DC-Back in Black. What can I say? I like classic rock.
Replace "cool" with "annoying" in that previous tweet, BTW.
Two nieces and two nephews are watching me post to twitter right now. It's kind of cool, actually. They're hanging all over me!
Packing up for a drive from Albany, NY to New Haven, CT. Freezing rain, sleet & snow forecast. Fun! Did I get the insurance for the rental?
United left the wife's bag in Chicago, so we're going back tomorrow to see if they brought it in overnight. Lame.
iPhone ping from the missus that they're finally docking at the gate. Holiday time has really begun now!
Awaiting my better half at Albany arrivals.
The wife made it to ORD, now awaiting departure of leg two! Oh, and her seat assignment. That might be important to have at some point.
Grocery shopping with my Dad and Sally: http://twitpic.com/vbl5
Wife made her flight no problem, all airports are functioning normally. Shoveled the drive and now back inside by the fire. Good Day so far.
Chocolate chunk marshmallow frosted cookies: http://twitpic.com/v3ch
Just iChatted with the wife who will be attempting cross-country air travel tomorrow, SJC to ALB via ORD. Should be an interesting trip!
Brother & his wife stopped by yesterday, she said he played too much Oblivion last year. Soon as they left I ran out and got him Fallout 3!
Heading out for dinner w/ Dad & Sally. Outback Steakhouse FTW! Less than a mile away, so hopefully not spending the night in a ditch!
Edible Arrangements + My Dad = Holiday Fun! http://twitpic.com/uml8
Hunkered down at my dad's house near Albany. Another foot of snow expected tomorrow. Cancelled a 45 minute drive to visit my brother too!
